1.title: So it begins pick your main character

11.content: So you just choose to be a 17 year old jerk that really desserves to oldpunished in everyway possible but... what about your sister? Take in count that you have brown hair and brown eyes so it's unlikely that your sister has any other color of eyes.
11.title: Matt

111.content:
I was a jock in the sense that i played soccer and ran track. I was known as the little guy in high school as i was only 5'1 and 118 lbs. My father was out of the picture and my Mom was 6'4 and very athletic. She took me to doctors growing up and they kept saying my growth spurt would come and it never did. I was just an anomaly. My baby sister Jessica was really really big for her age, she already stood 4 feet tall and weighed 53 lbs, the size of a 7 year old. At this time she started to follow me around and want to do everything i did. I would push her away and call her annoying. My mom told me to be nice to her. She didn't like how i talked to my baby sister. 4 months later she was still only 3 and now 4'3 inches tall and a solid 75 lbs. It was summer time and my mom had me watch Jessica sometimes while she went to work. Mom set her down and said i was going to watch her and she needed to be a good girl. She noticed Jessica was up to my shoulder in height already. "Gosh Jessica you are so tall...look how big you are next to brother' she said. That comment annoyed me and then she left. After about 10 minutes i smelled a major poopy diaper. I went and pulled the diaper back and said, 'lets change you' . She looked at me and said "no" and ran into the other room. Ok, i though and went in there. She proceeded to remove her diaper and stick her hands in her poop. "oh my gosh" i ran over. "Jessica, No' i said and grabbed her arm
with her other arm she smashed pooped on my cheek then yanked me hard and i fell over. She started cracking up laughing. "uhh gross' i said "Jessica stop' i pleaded. She was laughing hysterically and saying gross as i got up and grabbed her arms. She stood up too and it was a struggle. what the heck, she was very strong i could not completely overpower her. She was able to pin me onto the couch and i was pushing her away despearately and she put poop in my mouth and laughed hysterically and said gross. I broke free and ran and puked. I washed my face and watched as she smeared the wall. i tried to stop her again and could barely pull her away...she screaned and said "ouch" and then hit me hard in the face knocking me back. "ouch that hurt" she said and ran up and hit me again. it really hurt. Jessica, don't hit' i said . Want a bubble bath' i said. Her eyes lit up and she went to the tub. I was so relieved, i got her washed and she fell asleep and i cleaned the house. I did not say a word to mom about the incident, but did say it was too much for me to watch her.
111.title: Jessica, 3 years old

1111.content: About 3 more months went by and i avoided Jessica and even my mother as much as possible. When the dreaded knock came at my door and my Mom said i had to watch Jessica again as she had an emergency at work. It was 7am, i told her i couldn't and she said too bad, and told me absolutely no junk food for Jessica today. She said she kept trying to get into the ice cream, and then ran out the door. I was just really hoping she did not poop again. I groggily got up and walked downstairs and immediately saw Jessica going into the freezer. First thought was, a three year old should not be able to reach the freezer, second thought was oh know the ice cream. "Hey Jessica, what are you doing, no ice cream.' I kinda yelled and started to run over. When i reached her i stopped in my tracks and was a little scared now. What in the world happened she was the same height as me and much bigger.
1111.title: Getting Bigger

choices: Mom teaches jessica to lift weights
11111.content: Mom had been giving Jessica growth hormones since her 2nd birthday since she was so ashamed of Matt's size and did not want her 2nd child to be as small as him. Matt did not know this though, he just though he had a monstrous size sister. "No yelling at me brother" Jessica said looking very upset and stepping towards Matt. "Sorry but you can't have that" Matt said and snatched the ice cream out of her hand. As Matt went to put it back in the freezer Jessica grabbed his arm and swung him around really hard into the kitchen island. Matt hit so hard the wind knocked out of him and he dropped the ice cream. "You don't ever take my ice cream!' she yelled and grabbed Matt and turned him and pinned him against the wall hard. Matt tried to escape but she was pressing him so hard into the wall he was unable to escape her grasp. "Let go Jessica" Matt said trembling with fear now. "No, I won't" Jessica said in a very toddler-esque voice and pulled him off the wall and then slammed him back into the wall like a rag doll still holding onto his bend in his arms for grip. It hurt really bad and Matt groaned. "NO!, NO! NO!' Jessica slammed him three more times and was having a tantrum now. The third slam broke the dry wall and Matt was being pushed into the indent. "Jessica, please stop" Matt said now in a lot of pain. Jessica punched Matt in the face really hard on the nose and broke it. Blood went everywhere. Matt saw stars and keeled over on the ground knocked out. He woke up an hour later in a pool of blood and in pain. Jessica was covered in sticky ice cream on her face and arms and chest and sitting at the table eating cookies now. Matt managed to get up and went to the mirror. His nose was all busted up and he had two black eyes and another big cut under his right eye. He looked like Rocky Balboa after a fight. When mom got home she saw Jessica still all messy and blood on the floor still. She ran up to yell at Matt, then saw him and asked what happened. "Jessica...ummm.." Jessica now walked up besides mom. "Mom, Matt yelled at me" Jessica said. "Matt what happened" mom said..."Jessica..umm...Jessica beat me up" Matt said. "what are you talking about Matt" mom said. "i tried to take the ice cream from her and she beat me up" Matt said with his head down ashamed. "Matt stop lying, she is 3 years old, you are her damn 17 year old brother....why are you lying to me" Mom said. "i go boom, i pushed and punched brother" Jessica said in a toddler voice and motioning like she was punching. Matt pointed to her. "You're telling me she did that to your face" Mom said. "Mom, Yes, Jeez" Matt said and got up and walked over to mom and Jessica. "She is stronger than me, OK, are you happy now...look at her" Matt said standing face to face with Jessica now. "oh my gosh, she looks a lot stronger than you" mom said.
11111.title: Jessica beats up Matt

111111.content: Two months later and still a month before Jessica's 4th birthday and Mom had an important work meeting she needed to go into the office for. She came to Matt's room. "Jessica is napping, i will only be gone for 3 hours...Just don't wake her up" Mom told Matt. "No, don't leave me with her" Matt begged. "She is asleep, its ok" Mom said. Matt was petrified Jessica would wake up and start acting out. Matt was taking a pee when Jessica walked in the bathroom. She was now 5'4 and 3 inches taller than Matt. Matt peed and tried to walk out of the bathroom. Jessica pushed Matt hard into the wall and said "boom, ha ha" as he hit the wall and fell. Matt got up and ran and hid in the closet for the next two hours. Jessica thankfully just played in her room the rest of the time. It was now her birthday a month later. Mom went upstairs and told Matt he needed to come down to sing happy birthday to Jess. Matt reluctantly came down. She was already at the table with her cake and candles. We sang happy birthday and Mom cut the cake she gave Jessica the first piece then gave one to Matt. Jessica wolfed hers down and then snatched Matts. "hey Jessica give that back." Mom said. "it's ok mom" matt said feaing Jessica. "Matt, its not ok for her to bully you." Mom said. "That sounded insane in Matts ears. Mom walked over and went to get the cake back from Jessica. "no mom, my cake" Jessica said. "Jessica Lynn, don's sass back to me!" mom said and grabbed the plate. Jessica stood up and she was even taller than Matt remembered from before. She was nearly to Moms chin and 5'7 tall now. "Give it back!" Jessica said and pushed mom hard. Mom fell back and hit the wall and dropped the cake. Jessica got the cake off the floor and started eating eat with her hands. "You are in big trouble Jessica' Mom said and went to get the cake from her. They struggled and Mom was stunned at how strong Jessica was. Jessica smashed cake into moms face and laughed. Mom slapped Jessica in the face as hard as she could and Jessica laughed. Then grabbed mom by the shoulders and swung her hard into the wall denting the drywall. Then punched her in the face cutting her cheek. Mom was absolutely stunned. Jessica then proceeded to eat the entire cake. "yum cake' she said as mom cleaned up and was now stunned and fearful at what she had done with the growth pills.
111111.title: Jessica keeps getting bigger

2 months later and we were still 2 weeks until her 4th birthday. Matt came downstairs and saw his mom doing a P90X video. "Hey mom, you starting to work out again?" Matt said to her. Suddenly a voice from behind him. It was Jessica coming back from the bathroom. "Yeah and she is showing me how too" Jessica said

11112.content: He stared at her like a deer in headlights as he remembered struggling with her at 4'3, now she was 5'1 and had crazy thick muscular thighs and even semi muscular thick arms. It was insane to him. He ran into the closet to hide and watched as Jessica ate the entire carton of ice cream with her hands. She had not realized yet that she was as tall as me, or at least I thought she was as tall as me. It was exactly 1 month after her 4th birthday and Mom came up to my room and told me to get dressed that we were going to the doctor for our yearly check up. I tried to get out of it and said it was pointless but she was stern with me and said I had to go. Mom went downstairs and found out Jessica was outgrowing the clothes she just bought her yet again. Her shorts were very short and her thick sorta muscular thighs really bulged out. Her tank top was pretty tight too and Jessicas shoulders looked kinda broad and her arms sorta toned and pretty thick as well. "Ok Jessica, lets go to the doctor now" mom said to her. Jessica stomped her foot with an emphatic "No!" "Don't sass back Jessica, lets go" Mom said and went to grab Jessicas arm to pull her out the door
Mom was a little stunned to see Jessica was now almost to her shoulder in height and very stout and strong. As she pulled Jessicas arm, Jessica said no and knocked moms arm out of the way and started walking away. Mom ran over and tried stopping her and Jessica turned and pushed mom really hard and it knocked mom back who stumbled and nearly fell only catching herself on the wall a few feet away. This was the first time mom regretted giving her the growth hormone. She went to the cabinet to put the hormone in her purse and the bottle was empty. Jessica saw her mom and said "yum, candy". "Did you eat all of these" mom said.
"yes, yummy candy" Jessica said. Oh my gosh, she was only supposed to take 1 every two weeks and Jessica ate all 25 pills. That explains why she is so big now. Mom bribed Jessica with cookies to get into the car. Jessica was long past the car seat and now looked really ridiculous even sitting in the booster seat as she was so large now. Matt groggily came out and got in the backseat next to Jessica and buckled in. Mom always had her briefcase and boxes in the passenger seat up front. Mom noticed immediately that Jessica looked much larger than me. Her thighs were like 5 times bigger than mine and her arms at least 3 times bigger. She also seemed to be sitting slightly higher than me with her legs touching the floor like mine. Matt looked over and was petrified, Jessica looked even more insanely huge to him. When we arrived at the doctor and got out of the car, Jessica was much taller than me now. She was 5'5 and 155 lbs of mostly muscle. Mom immediately panicked and said, "we can't go in there, get back in the car' . So we did. She feared the doctors would find out she was using the illegal growth hormone.

Start over... a different scenario for Lizzie
11133.content:
Matt was a jerk to his 5 year old sister Lizzie. Kicking down the towers she would build out of blocks, wrestling her, and making fun of her for still having to wear pull-ups because she would sometimes have accidents.

Their parents were inventors, and they discussed over dinner one night their prototype size rays had passed all preliminary testing. They joked that their Mom shrunk their Dad to half his size! They mused about who they would sell it to, and joked that if Matt or Lizzie acted up, they might punish them with it. Lizzie’s ears perked up to that idea, thinking about a way to get revenge on Matt.

She snuck into their workspace one night, stealing one of the prototype rays.

The next day, the parents told Matt and Lizzie they would be going out. “Keep an eye on your sister. Make sure she doesn’t have any—“

“Daddy! I’m a big girl! You don’t need to say anything!” Lizzie barked back.

“Oh, shut up. We know you need DIAPERS, you peepants.” Matt said mockingly, laughing.

“We’ll see who’s laughing soon...” Lizzie said under her breath. Her parents left a moment later.

Matt was in the living room playing his video games. While he was distracted, Lizzie scurried away to grab the prototype she stole. She pointed it:
11133.title: Lizzie age 5

111331.content: Since he was so engrossed in his game, Matt failed to notice the size ray shrinking him down. A moment went by, until he finally became aware of his new size:
111331.title: At Matt, making him smaller.

1113311.content:
Matt was startled to the sound of two gigantic feet stripping down on either side of him. He looked up to the sight of his “little” sister, only this time, Lizzie was towering over him. From his view, he could see the pink pull-up under her skirt, thankfully not wet or messy yet.

“Who’s ‘little’ now, Matt?” Lizzie said. “I can’t believe this ray worked! You’re so tiny I could squish you like a bug!” She raised her foot over Matt.

“NO!! PLEASE!! Don’t squish me!! I’m sorry for being mean, okay? Just unshrink me!”

“You wish, bug boy! You made fun of me, so now you’re gonna be my toy!” Lizzie said. She reached down to pluck Matt. Seeing her squat, Matt proceed to run under Lizzie’s legs. In response to that move, Lizzie dropped her diapered butt to the floor, blocking Matt with a wall of pull-up. He looked up at the diaper, which was enormous compared to him, and his eyes continued up to Lizzie’s face. “Awww Matt, I just wanna play! C’monnnnn, it’ll be fun!”

“And if I don’t?” Matt asked.

“Mommy and Daddy will sure have a hard time finding you if you get smaller...maybe they’ll step on you thinking you’re a bug? Or maybe I’ll just have to squish you?”

Matt’s blood ran cold hearing that threat. “So if I play with you, you’ll change me back?” Matt asked.

“Uh huuuuuuhhhh. If you play with me.”

Matt sighed. “Okay, we can play.”

Lizzie giggled, grabbing Matt. “Okay! Time to play!”

What does Lizzie do with Matt?
1113311.title: 1 inch tall

11133112.content:
Lizzie brought Matt over by her toy blocks, setting Matt on the floor. “No running or I’ll make you shrink again!” Lizzie threatened. She brought the size ray over with her, so she would make good on that threat.

Lizzie assembled the blocks into several towers, placing Matt atop one of them.

“Okay Matt, first game I’m a giant monster and I’m gonna destroy the city! Run away before it’s too late!” Lizzie instructed.

“Lizzie I’m too small! It’s the size of a city for me!”

“Guess you gotta move quick! It’s what you get for always kicking my towers down!” She responded.

With that, she tapped her sneaker against a tower, toppling it. Matt attempted to try and find a way down, but the tower was neatly stacked, making it a 3 story drop at his inch tall size. Finally, Lizzie gets to standing in front of the tower Matt was on, Matt seeing up Lizzie’s skirt and seeing her pull-up. “Hmmmmm, I need a seat!” Lizzie said, turning around, moving her diapered butt towards the tower. “No no no no NO-“ Matt pleaded until Lizzie’s butt made contact, knocking the tower over. Lucky for Matt, the playmat the bricks were on was soft, making the impact hurt, but not in a way that would cause major injury.

Lizzie turned around, seeing Matt survived. “You survived my butt, but you still gotta run, bug boy!” Lizzie said, getting up. Lizzie started kicking blocks and moving them in front of Matt as he tried to get away. Soon, Matt was walled in on all sides. He couldn’t get away again.

“Guess you couldn’t get away quick enough!” Lizzie said, smirking.

What does Lizzie do next?

14.content:
It was Tuesday, and I wasn't the biggest fan of Tuesdays. I, like every other sophomore high schooler-slash-high schooler in general, hated Mondays much, much more. However, I, unlike everyone else, had a job Tuesday to Thursday, with Friday off, and the weekend working before getting Monday off. Weird schedule, amiright?

Well, not everyone had a job working for the neighborhood kook in his weird magic shop.

That wasn't so much an exaggeration as you might've believed. See, magic is… well… it's fucking real, okay. Smoke and mirrors be damned, I've seen some eye popping, faith in God testing, no other explanation available kinda shit done with a piece of chalk and a can of Morton's salt.

My boss was a nice enough old man, if a bit smelly at times due to potions and other such nonsense. If I needed to watch my sisters or babysit my niece, he'd happily close shop early or man the counter himself if one of his fellow magi were coming by. I liked him, and the front of the store was a front so, bonus, no selling jars of eye of newt or some other real magical boosters, charms and stuff. However, every now and then, someone would come by looking for that stuff, real magi, and he'd take them into the back, soundproof spell the room and serve them tea and crumpets.

I assume, at any rate. That's right, I knew I worked in a real magic shop, knew a real wizard and he didn't wipe my mind or anything. It was a bit of our unspoken agreement; he had money and an open position for someone to work his gag-gift magic shop so he could do his real magic and deal with his real customers, and I wanted money and could keep my mouth shut rather well. This usually went both ways; I don't ask or tell his business too often, but one of my few questions back when I had first started and a while after I learned the truth earned me a scolding when I asked him how magic worked.

“It's magic, I don't have to explain shit!” he yelled in my face. I didn't flinch, apologize or demand answers; I simply nodded.

“Understood; magic shop is for you and those other magi, joke shop is for me and the dopes who come in the front.”

He grumbled and mumbled darkly on his way back into his lair, but came out as I was getting ready to leave for home. He apologized for the yelling, even offered to teach me a bit about magic, not how to do actual magic of course, but I denied. His business was magic, mine was high school, part time job in a magic shop and my family.

Since then, our relationship has been rather friendly; I'd chat with him about topics that bordered very lightly on true magic, such as astronomy or zoology, and he'd helped me study for the occasional test. No memory potions, although he joked about taking one every evening to keep himself sharp, just pointers and perceptive on math, history, language arts and so on.

I wouldn't call us friends, but we get along well for having an employee/employer relationship. However, on that Tuesday, I had to leave early, having received his okay of course, to…

Helping him in the past entered.

Are you out of your mind Adam?”


“Amy calm down my son was about to explain himself before I decided rather to murder or just maim him”
said Adam’s Mother nonchalantly.


Adam gulped.
“Well first of all it was an accident. Mia was exploring the classroom and then for some reason grabbed a cloth that was on a desk in the lab...”


Mia interrupted.
“It was a pwetty color I wanted to dress my dolly in it”


Adam continues
“Anyway she pulled the cloth and the formula that Amy mentioned spilled on Mia. It was an accident and I tried to clean it up as fast as possible. The odd part was it seemed to absorb into her body”


“It was icky” added Mia.


“Adam what were you thinking not keeping dangerous things out of Mia’s reach? You’re supposed to be her big brother and you were supposed to be watching her” said their mother.


“I didn’t even realize the formula was and it’s not that dangerous at least not to Mia I don’t think”


“You don’t think? You don’t think? THIS IS MY DAUGHTER AND YOUR LITTLE SISTER SO YOU’D BETTER DO A HELL OF A LOT OF THINKING WHEN IT COME TO HER AND WHAT YOU HAVE DONE TO HER”


“Ahem if I may I’d like to hear any data or info you can tell us about Mia since the incident.
First though I’d like to say I’m sorry that Elizabeth apparently left the formula out.
I’d also like to point out that although Mia isn’t seemingly in any immediate danger that in some ways she could become a danger to herself or others plus we still don’t know the full effects the chemicals will have on her.”



“I’m aware of that Amy”


“Are you Adam? Are you really? Remember that growth serum isn’t fully tested or perfected yet.
Also keep in mind Mia is just a child, besides the caring for her part she’s still a growing girl even without the serum.
Who knows how it will affect her development in life even if we neutralize or reverse it there’s no guarantees what the end results will be. We can only hope it does her more good than harm”



“Wait what are you suggesting might happen to my Little Angel”
panicked their mom.


“Well worst case scenario whatever cure we concoct could work too well and potentially stunt her growth worse than it already was. Best case scenario is getting her back to the status quo or maybe even making up for the size deficit you and Adam had previously been concerned about her having”


“This is all so complicated and crazy but please just fix my little darling”


“Well you asked for the details on Mia so here goes”

*10 Minutes Of explanations later*


“I see so she’s having growth spurts but they’re becoming more concerning. That’s not good and you’re right to be worried. The ingredients are crazy rare and expensive. I dare say she could well end up a giant before we can fix this and that could complicate curing her as well as hiding or protecting her, it’s interesting tho that her healing factor is increasing exponentially”



“Wait what do you mean my little girl could become a giant”



“I don’t want to worry you Misses Roberts but think of it like this.
Your daughter brings new meaning to the phrase “growing little girl” in more ways than one.
We don’t know if or when she’ll stop.
What we do know is that this isn’t something fixable in a mere matter of hours.
As such just like I said your daughter could grow into a giant or as I believe the more PC term on the internet and other places would be a giantess.
She could just keep growing bigger and bigger”



“Oh no my poor sweet little angel”

she asks.

Tricia looked over at the 5’10” girl but something seemed off.

Then Tricia noticed something.
“Wait a minute where’s the experimental Quantum Organic Modifier Serum? And why does something seem off about your sister.... OH MY GOD PLEASE DONT TELL ME YOU DID WHAT I THINK YOU DID”


“Crap! Wait I can explain it’s not what you think”


Suddenly Mia just blew your cover and attempted lie
“Big brother you said you didn’t get smaller but now my teddy bear is smaller too”

Damn this was boding well for Adam.

“You were saying Adam? I can’t believe you’d use a child your sister no less as a guinea pig! Do you have any idea what you’ve done? That serum isn’t even tested much less there’s nowhere near close to a cure or reversal serum”


Adam went pale.

“I-I bu- It was an accident it wasn’t like I did it on purpose”


“Accident or not you’re still responsible”

Mia interrupted again.
“Big brother please do some my teddy is smaller and so are you”

Adam sighed it was time to come clean.
“Mia it’s not us that’s getting smaller, you’re the one that’s growing”


Mia looked at Adam now standing up at 6’2”
“Silly brother of course I’m growing, mommy says good girls who eats their vegetables grow up to be big girls”


Adam groaned internally. Did she really not get it?
Tricia spoke next.

“No dear that’s not quite what your brother means”

Mia spoke again.
“Sorry pwetty lady but mommy says never to trust or talk to strangers”

“Sorry Mia this is Tricia, Tricia this is my little sister Mia”

“Ahem now that that’s out of the way your brother means to say you are getting bigger”

Mia still didn’t quite get it or know how to interpret it.
She made a cute confused and thinking face then it clicked albeit in a childish way.

“Aha I got it so I’m becoming a big girl” she said.

“Well yeah I’m a matter of speaking” said Tricia without thinking.


Mia’s eyes lit up like it was Christmas morning.
“Yay I’m going to be a big girl! That means I can do things mommy and brother do and I can stay awake later”


Adam and Tricia both mentally slapped themselves.
The gravity of the situation was lost on the innocent child as was the concepts of size to some degree.


Mia was off in her own world rambling now.
Adam and Tricia for now left her to her own devices.

“So what exactly happened to Mia, how much was she exposed to and what can you tell me about her”

“Well for starters she’s a little over 3 years old. You’ve seen some of her personality already”

“Yea thank goodness she doesn’t seem the type to intentionally do harm or bratty in a bad way”



“Anyway she was 2’8” this morning and this is where we are now. I can’t say for sure how much exposure she had but most of her clothes had gotten soaked along with a good deal of her body. I didn’t wanna risk exposure or contamination so I dried as much as I could from her clothes with a blow dryer, wiped her down with a towel and got her dressed again minus shocks or shoes”



“Hmm I see. Well this could be a huge problem quite literally. Judging by her size and rate of growth I’d say she’s growing 2 inches per minute roughly. How long was it since the incident”

Adam looked at the clock.
“Hmmm maybe an hour or so but I don’t think the serum took immediate effect”


“Oh trust me Adam it took immediate effect it’s just that in the last batch we tested the effect on organic things such as plants particularly veggies was delayed and proportional depending on the starting size, and age of the plant plus the amount. Unfortunately several earlier test subjects had to be killed off because they got too big”



“Wait you aren’t seriously suggesting we kill my sister”


“No id never do that. Not only would it be unethical but it would be cruel to boot. Your sister is just a child and an innocent victim of circumstance plus right now she’s not a threat. Another thing is I’m aware you care about her even if you’ve complained a bit in the staff lounge on occasion”


“So then what are you saying”


“Well the situation is still not good. There’s no telling how big Mia might get and it’s definitely not something we are going to be able to cure anytime soon”

With that they took her to the college’s football stadium. It was every bit as big as some of the biggest professional NFL Stadiums and best of all the campus was mostly deserted.

Thankfully he was able to raid the concessions stands.

Mia also drank 3 cases of water and 2 cases of soda.

151223311112.content:
After hours of searching, Adam's and Tricia's efforts are proving to be fruitless. Adam sighs, feeling bad for how his sister has run off, while Tricia is more worried about the possible dangers of Mia's relentless growth.


          "Do you hear that?" Adam asks as he looks around.


          Tricia stops to listen as well. "Yeah” she says as she looks at Adam, "It sounds like a little girl crying."


          They both take off, heading for the woods, following the sound of the sobbing. When they arrive, they both stop when they see just how big Mia is now. She had to be about sixty feet tall now, her feet alone are bigger than either of them, and her soles are covered with dirt from all the walking she did. Though her tears are washing the dirt away slowly at her size. Plus with her growth continuing, she won't be that size much longer.



         Mia sniffles a bit as she looks at Tricia. "Meanie," she says, still crying a bit.


          "Look Mia, I'm sorry," Tricia apologizes. " I shouldn't have yelled at you. Will you please come back with me and your brother! "


         Mia just looks at her, as she is getting closer to sixty feet in height, the top of her head approaching the top of some of the trees, shaking her head.


          "She is going to get you cookies if you come with us," Adam bribes.



          "Cookies!" Mia says excitedly. As she tries to get up, she starts to shake, as if she is shuddering.


          "Adam," Tricia says as she starts to worry, "Whats happening with Mia?"


          Adam just shakes his head as he answers, " I, I don't know. "


         They both watch as they are unsure what is going to happen to Mia, fearing for the worst.

15123313211.content:
The world looked so different to her now more than ever before. Everything around her had gotten so small. Not that she could fully comprehend it. Mia pouted for a moment as she tried to process her surroundings, completely unaware of the people freaking out down below.

While looking around something in particular caught her eye. A big movie poster advertising a classic flick... Godzilla. Mia remembered the giant lizard from her dad's movie collection. She could recall sneaking downstairs at night and catching glimpses of her dad watching the lizard play monster in the city.

If it could make her dad laugh the way it did than it must've been a fun game. She wanted to lay monster too. It didn't take long for her to get back to the city, shaking the earth with every enormous step she took. The townsfolk scrambled in terror as the giant toddler who used their power plant as a giant 'POTTY' returned.

Mia towered over the buildings that were once on par with her size, the skyscrapers just barley reaching her knees. Playing the role of a monster she gave her best roar, which in honesty came out sounding more adorable if anything. But at her current size it boomed like thunder and sent the already panicked townsfolk into a frenzy.

Adam for his part couldn't understand a single thing going on here. Why was his little sister all of a sudden an 800ft monster? Also, what was she doing? Was she pretending to be a lion or something with that roar? It wouldn't be the first time she tried to become a lion.

Those thoughts however proved incorrect as Mia-Zilla all of a sudden pushed a building over. Adam's eyebrows shot to his forehead as he watched his innocent 'BIG' sister start pushing buildings over. Just what on earth was running through her mind?

"Roar!" she giggled as she blew air onto one of the skyscrapers, which in tern knocked it down. Everyone down below zig zagged to avoid the falling debris, screaming "MONSTER!' at the top of their lungs. At her current size, Mia couldn't really hear them all that well. But they were acting like the people in the movie so that must mean they want to play too.

Adam was scared, he finally realized what Mia was doing. She was playing monster! Of all the games to play it just had to be that one. The next thing he knew he saw his little sister throw a car into a convenient store. That poor establishment never stood a chance.

He had to fix this, he had to find some way to stop her and shrink her back down to size. There was just one problem though, he had no idea how she'd gotten this big in the first place. The last thing he remembered before he took a spill was energy. "Electricity!" he shouted.

He knew electricity played a role, but there had to be more. He had to think back, what else happened today. Then it finally hit him like a ton of bricks. The chemical back at the lab. His ditzy lab assistant never but it away like he instructed. That lady was so getting fired.

A few more structures fell, snapping Adam out of his thoughts. He needed to get back to the lab. He needed to put some kind of antidote together before Mia got any bigger or anything bizarre could happen. He didn't want to leave her here alone, but at her current size there was no way she'd hear him. Or worse she might think he's part of her little 'game' and squash him.

But at the same time she was still his sister and he still couldn't leave her. What if more people got hurt because he left? What would happen to her if he wasn't here? What was the best choice to make? Go to the lab and risk Mia's safety while he was away? Or stay and try to get her attention and mitigate the damage?

151233132113.content:
Adam knew what he had to do, he needed to get to the lab. Without a cure nothing could stop Mia from destroying the town. He also made a mental note to fire his ditz of an assistant if he saw her. With his mind made up her prayed nothing would go wrong before exiting the station.

Once Adam made it to street level he got a good glimpse of the destruction his innocent little sister had caused. To think she could reek so much havoc. The decimated buildings, the dilapidated streets, the crushed cars, the citizens running for their lives. It was complete pandemonium out here.

Then the ground shook. Adam knew better than to assume it was an earthquake. He looked up to see it was his 'BIG' sister Mia making her way down the block. Each step was like thunder. Adam could only watch helplessly as some civilians couldn't dive out of the way in time.

It was so horrible. All those innocent people squashed like a ketchup packet on the ground. He shuddered to think what the bottom of her soles looked like. But Adam knew he had a bigger problem right now. Mia was headed in his direction. Like everyone else, he took off down the road at top speed.

People frantically fought to get out of the way as the giantess approached. Townsfolk trampled and knocked each other over in a desperate attempt at escape. The only ones to likely make it away were those in the news copter up above. Adam though wasn't as fortunate. In the ensuing chaos he was violently knocked to the ground.

He tried to cover himself but the trampling footsteps took their toll and he was left defenseless. Another loud boom sounded followed by more screams. Adam looked up in horror to see his little sister was closing in. She'd even knocked over another tower.

Adam tried desperately to move but his legs just wouldn't respond. He looked down to see they were mangled, broken. There was no way for him to escape. Another loud boom sound, and Adam was greeted by the most horrifying sight he'd ever laid eyes on. The bottom of Mia's bare foot.

He could make out every creased in the skin, every red spot, ever piece of dirt and debris, every corpse that was plastered on like an old gum rapper. He would be joining them all soon. Her foot fell in slow motion. The world around him silent. Mia's shadow engulfed him... and then there was nothing.

Mia continued on, playing monster to her hearts content. She never even realized that she'd just crushed her brother flat. Another corpse stuck to the bottom of her foot. Humanity's only hope to stop the madness was gone. Now nothing could stop the giantess.

Adam knew what he had to do, he needed to get to the lab. Without a cure nothing could stop Mia from destroying the town. He also made a mental note to fire his ditz of an assistant if he saw her. With his mind made up her prayed nothing would go wrong before exiting the station.

Once Adam made it to street level he got a good glimpse of the destruction his innocent little sister had caused. To think she could reek so much havoc. The decimated buildings, the dilapidated streets, the crushed cars, the citizens running for their lives. It was complete pandemonium out here.

Then the ground shook. Adam knew better than to assume it was an earthquake. He looked up to see it was his 'BIG' sister Mia making her way down the block. Each step was like thunder. Adam could only watch helplessly as some civilians couldn't dive out of the way in time.

It was so horrible. All those innocent people squashed like a ketchup packet on the ground. He shuddered to think what the bottom of her soles looked like. But Adam knew he had a bigger problem right now. Mia was headed in his direction. Like everyone else, he took off down the road at top speed.

People frantically fought to get out of the way as the giantess approached. Townsfolk trampled and knocked each other over in a desperate attempt at escape. The only ones to likely make it away were those in the news copter up above. Adam though wasn't as fortunate. In the ensuing chaos he was violently knocked to the ground.

He tried to cover himself but the trampling footsteps took their toll and he was left defenseless. Another loud boom sounded followed by more screams. Adam looked up in horror to see his little sister was closing in. She'd even knocked over another tower.

Adam tried desperately to move but his legs just wouldn't respond. He looked down to see they were mangled, broken. There was no way for him to escape. Another loud boom sound, and Adam was greeted by the most horrifying sight he'd ever laid eyes on. The bottom of Mia's bare foot.

He could make out every creased in the skin, every red spot, ever piece of dirt and debris, every corpse that was plastered on like an old gum rapper. He would be joining them all soon. Her foot fell in slow motion. The world around him silent. Mia's shadow engulfed him... and then there was nothing.

Mia continued on, playing monster to her hearts content. She never even realized that she'd just crushed her brother flat. Another corpse stuck to the bottom of her foot. Humanity's only hope to stop the madness was gone. Now nothing could stop the 800 foot unaware giantess.


Eventually Mia grew bored.
“Huh this is no fun anymore
and I don’t think the movie was this long.”


Mia help a finger to her chin
and scrunched her face in the
cutest way.
It was an odd tick or tendency when
she was curious, confused or thinking hard.


Were it not for the fact the child moments
ago been on a spree of destruction 90%
of the population would be gushing
at how friggin adorable Mia’s face
scrunching looked.

It didn’t exactly help that she started taping
one of her feet “lightly” creating small
tremors.


“I dunno where big brother went
but I think I need another game for
this toy city.”


Some panicked people actually stopped.
Did she actually think this was a game?
That everything was just toys?


Mia was in fact blissfully unaware of the
thousands of lives she took including
some of her own family.
What now?

Mia spots a huge mansion.
To her of course it’s dollhouse size.

“I know I’ll play house”

Mia walks over again causing more
innocent unintentional destruction.


Mia sits down in the front yard
flattening the fence and a garden as well
as causing an earthquake just by sitting.


The 800 foot child is oblivious to news crews
and news copters having followed her.


Mia then easily tears the roof off the mansion.

“Now do we have any dollies or something?”


Unfortunately the house was empty.

“Aww it’s fancy but it’s empty.
How am I gonna play house now?”


Mia looks around and spots some statues.
She picks 2 up 1 in each hand.

“I guess these will work but they don’t seem
to move much.
Now then you can be the mommy
you can be the daddy and I’ll be the
adorable daughter”


The people watching the news were
incredulous. This child did indeed think
everything was a toy.


Mia played for a few more minutes then
accidentally broke 1 of the statues.

“Oops I broke it.”

Then Mia actually set in motion a scenario
that would tug at many folks hearts.


“I guess mommy is gone”

Mia began to sniffle. At 1st people were
confused.


“Just like my mommy and daddy”


Suddenly Mia began to cry.

No one knew how this giant child came
to be but now their hearts felt for her.


The news crews on the ground weren’t
prepared for tears the size of garbage trucks.


They had to move dodge and weave.


“I miss mommy and daddy’


Tears began to flood and damage the mansion.

“And now my brother is missing and
I don’t even know where this toy city is”


“I feel so alone”

Juleit sticks Mia and it causes her to grow more
151233132113322.content:
As Mia continued to cry, she never noticed the Harley that pulled up to her. On the bike was none other than her brother's ditzy lab assistant, Juliet. The woman was still dressed in her revealing outfit with a dangerously short skirt and open-toed heels. She also still had her lab coat and was currently wearing a helmet.

"Holy cow, she's big!" Juliet breathed. On the back of her Harley was a comically oversized needle that she had duck-taped on so it wouldn't fall off. She'd been in the teacher's lounge watching her favorite show until the news suddenly popped up. She tried to change the channel but it was on every station.

What she saw left her stunned. She was her boss's little sister Mia as an 800ft giant destroying the town. What? How? And was that her favorite clothing store the little/big monster destroyed? The first thing running through her mind was where her boss was? Surly he wouldn't leave Mia alone. So where was he?

Juliet didn't know and didn't really have the time to ponder. Mia had to be stopped. She had run back to the lab and run to the very back wall. There lied a picture of Einstein that Juliet ripped from the wall to reveal a class window with the words, 'IN CASE OF EMERGENCY, BREAK GLASS!' displayed.

She grabbed an nearby stapler and did just that. The glass shattered to show what was behind the glass... a vile with a pink liquid sealed by a cork. She remembered Adam told her this was some kind of gene blah, blah, blah... she wasn't really listening. All she knew was it fixed bad chemicals.

She came to the conclusion that this could fix Mia if she drank it. That's how this stuff worked in the movies after all. Another problem was this was a small vile and Mia was huge. She needed more. That's when inspiration struck. She pocketed the vile and drove to the nearby party store. She bought the oversized needle and filled it with water before pouring the vile into it. The whole thing turned Pink much to Juliet's approval.

The ditzy blonde then duck-taped it to her Harley and drove off to the city, which lead her to right now. Juliet pulled out a pen and began to repeatedly click it. An annoying habit that helped her think. If she remembered correctly, Adam told her Mia hated needles. She then looked back her Harley and knew this might be a problem. She'll just have to inject Mia while she's not looking.

Meanwhile the news crew who'd taken cover finally noticed the hot blonde in a lab coat that was holding a giant oversized needle above her head. Everyone did. It was equal parts fascinating as it was confusing. Was she going to inject her with that strange liquid? What would happen?

"Alright, just ram it into her." Juliet told herself. "One count of three... 1!"

Mia stopped crying.

"...2!"

Mia began to shift.

"...3!" Juliet charged.

Tickles

He tried to cover himself but the trampling
footsteps took their toll and he was
left defenseless. Another loud boom sounded
followed by more screams.
Adam looked up in horror to see his “little”
sister was closing in. She'd even knocked over another tower and let out another mock roar
that at normal size would’ve been the cutest thing
ever and funny. In fact it was still cute
but unfortunately the danger and threat were
all too real amid the giant child’s innocent fun.



Adam tried desperately to move
but his legs just wouldn't respond.
He looked down to see they were trapped
under mangled debris. He was stuck.
There was no way for him to escape.
Another loud boom sound, and Adam was
greeted by the most horrifying sight he'd ever
laid eyes on. The bottom of Mia's bare foot.
They were smelly and bigger than he’d ever
could’ve imagined. Where normal size
Mia had always had abnormal small feet,
been short and dainty in every sense now
despite her proportions being he same
it was the complete opposite.
At 800 feet tall you’d be hard pressed
to find anything “dainty” about her.




He could make out every crease in the skin,
every red spot, ever piece of dirt and debris,
every corpse that was plastered on like an old
gum rapper. He would be joining them all soon.
Her foot fell in slow motion.
The world around him silent.
Mia's shadow engulfed him.



Suddenly the approaching foot of his not
so little sister stopped it’s descent.
It then retreated.
Adam looked up and saw the face of his
“Little” sister.



She made an all too familiar cute yet
funny face as she scrunched her nose.
Adam knee it was her confused or thinking
hard face though he wasn’t sure why
she was making that face now.



Mia on the other hand felt strange.
She didn’t know what vertigo was but
there was that and a mix of other strange
feelings.



“I feel funny” Mia said holding her
stomach cutely or at least as cute as a
giant could be.
Suddenly Mia unknown to her began
to grow even bigger.



To Adam it was noticeable though from
mere feet away as her feet and toes enlarged
and her face gets bigger yet further away.


The growth spurt didn’t last long and the
increase was barely noticeable to the
“Little” girl.
To Adam and the world below though in
about a minute Mia added another 100 feet
to her height bringing her to 900 feet tall.



Adam was shocked. How had she’d grown again?
Wasn’t electricity the catalyst?
Her antics had taken much of the local power grid
offline so how? Are you telling me she’s
gonna keep growing no matter what without a cure?



Adam was stirred from his thoughts as the
innocent not fully aware child recovered.
The feelings had passed and she spoke.
She was again scrunching her face cutely.


“That was really weird! Well now what?”

Mia taps her barefoot to the road and
scrunches her face pondering what to do.

1513.content:
****Warning applies to this path from here on out. This path WILL ALLOW Mia to outgrow her clothes just please try to keep descriptiveness as innocent as possible and not over detailed**


Mia - Age 3
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/94...

2’6” ( exclusive starting height to this path )

Was playing dolls as her brilliant brother tended to his work.
He worked and she played till it was snack time.


Mia was hungry but Adam was busy.
Mia went looking for something to eat.
Mia soon spots a 3 very large jars full of red “candies” on a table she can’t reach.
Mia sets down her teddy bear noticing the table cloth.


She tugs on it and 1 of the jars move.
Tugging again it falls but she catches it.
The lid had been left off.



“Yummy candy” she says.
Mia sticks her hand in grabbing about 5 pills given their size and the size of her hands.
She sticks them in her mouth and swallows.
They have a faint cherry flavor.


Mia sat the jar down and began consuming handful after handful.
Oddly the candy did nothing to ease her appetite.
On the 20th handful she spaced out for a moment falling into a daze.
Little did she realize she’d consumed enough to become addicted.



Mia snaps out of it and resumed eating.
Adam wondering about the quiet went to see what Mia was up to.
To his horror he found her eating the Meta-Gro Pills intended only for people with height or dwarfism problems which although Mia had been on the small side didn’t include her.


He manages to get Mia to stop for now but the damage is already done.
1513.title: Mia and the Meta-Gro Pills mistaken for candy **

choices: She grows 15% with each growth spurt
She grows 33% with each growth spurt
She grows by 52% with each growth spurt at least until they reach a plateau
Oh no! Mia doubles in size each time! Not good!
15131.content:
Adam looks at the jar, seeing how it is nearly half empty now. He looks back at his sister, who is standing up, desperately trying to reach for one of the other two jars, already tugging at the table cloth again.



          "Mia, No!" Adam shouts as he grabs the other two jars. " This isn't candy. "


         Mia sits down on the floor as she starts to cry, watching Adam lock up all three jars in a cabinet.



          "But I, but I want more candy!" Mia says as she continues to sob.



          Adam returns sitting next to his sister, as he looks at her. "I know, but its not candy. Its medicine for people who are sick."



          Sniffling a couple times, Mia responds, "It is?"



          " Yes, " Adam answers. "And it can make you sick unless a doctor tells you to take it."



         Mia shifts a bit as she starts to feel a bit funny. "Can I have a little more?" she asks her brother.


          "Sorry, Mia," he says as he rubs his sister's head, " Like I said its medicine. As Adam stands up, a gurgling sound is heard from Mia's stomach.



          "I feel dizzy," Mia complains as a wave of vertigo washes over her.


         Adam's eyes widen as he turns to face Mia, recognizing dizziness as one of the side effects mentioned for Meta-Gro. The dizziness passes quickly tho.



He can already see Mia's dress shifting on her body as it is starting to hug her form, the bottom starting to rise up. Her bare feet and legs were inching larger as they creep across the floor.


          "My clothes feel tight," Mia complains as she is unaware of her current situation.


          How much will Mia grow each time?

Mia's clothes are becoming form fitting on her, her underwear becoming visible as the bottom rises up on her. Mia is looking at her clothes, confused as to why they are getting tighter on her, but her focus soon shifts to her shoes as they are feeling uncomfortably tight on her.




Her toes are being shoved in the fronts as her feet are running out of room. Soon the fronts of her shoes start to tear at the fronts as her sock clad toes begin to push themselves through. Soon the fronts of her shoes split open as her toes are now free. The sides of her dress start to split open as her flesh is bulging through the openins, her underwear now riding up on her. Soon the dizziness fades as her growth slows to a halt.



"Uh-oh," Mia says innocently as she looks at herself, tugging at her dress a nit, causing more tears to form. The gravity of the situation lost on the child.



Adam can only stare at his now taller sister, who is taking her shoes off. Her growth is unprecedented as she just grew about nine inches before his very eyes. With the clinical trials that were run for Meta-gro, no one grew more than a few inches over time. The only exception was one woman who downed an entire bottle, and she only grew six inches, while having major health issue. But Mia's body seems to have accepted that large dose, no problem.




As Mia pucks her dolls back up, Adam tries to think of what course of action to take.

15432.title: Cindy, maybe?

154321.content:
Friday afternoon.
Cindy opened to front door of her house, not looking up from the phone in her hand.
It was rather quiet, and would probably stay that way until Sunday evening, her parents at some work related whatever-it-was.
But that meant she had to watch Shelly, ruining her plans for the weekend.
Maybe she could call some friends over, if Shelly promised not to tattle on her for a change.

Cindy dropped her bag, and walked to the shoe closet.
Putting down her phone, she noticed something on top of it, inspecting it as she took off and put away her shoes.

A shiny chrome remote of some sort, like a garage garage clicker, but a bit thinner.
It had big two buttons half way the device, one simply labeled Sx, the other Gx, and a thin, above these two smaller buttons + and -.
Right below two more buttons, reading AP and AR.
Above the buttons, there was a small LED display that read 4.
At the bottom another display was flashing RECHARGING, right next to something she did recognize: an on/off switch.

Curious, she picked up the device, forgetting her phone, and started walking.
One of Shelly's toys? But it felt like real metal, and looked so plain.
Maybe it was something her parents took home from work?
She tapped the plus and minus button, going up to 10, down to 2, and back to 4 again.
As she entered the living room, the device suddenly beeped.
The display below now read CHARGED.

"Cindy!" she looked up to see her sister sitting across the room, sitting at the dinner table with pencils and paper, sporting a bright smile on her face.
Before she could begin to answer, Shelly had already sprinted across the room and glomped her older sister.
By surprise, she pressed the S button,as it beeped she dropped by surprise, and as it fell, it was aimed her her as it flashed, like a camera.
Cindy felt dizzy, and her eyes dazzled by the flash, and she could hear Shelly gasped and take a step back.
She looked down.

At 27 ( yea I changed her age because reasons )

At 27 Linda was fairly successful and quite a talented scientist
Unfortunately she was a single parent. Her daughters father had cheated on her than ran out on them.
Every since Linda had tried to be a good parent and was for the most part.
There were times she had mixed feelings about motherhood though.



Today was one of those days and one of those times she was being a questionable mother.
You see for quite some time the government agency she worked for had been working on a project that was now ready for live trials after 1 test on an animal However her noses were pushing for a human trail.


Eventually her bosses wore her down and made her a hard to refuse offer
after seeing pictures of Linda's 2 1/2 year old daughter Sara.

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/76...

Linda had brought Sara in but felt horrible for considering this idea however if successful and Sara was safe they'd be super wealthy plus Linda would have a major promotion to boot.


Her bosses addressed Sara as she held her stuffed rabbit and cutely had a finger in her mouth.

"Now Sara we are going to need you to let go of mister rabbit for a little while but if everything goes ok afterwards how does a pile of ice cream bigger than you sound"


Sara looked at her stuffed rabbit then her mom
She took her finger from her mouth and handed it to her mom while saying
"Ice cweam ice cweam"


"Sounds like she's in agreement" joked the supervisor.

"And tell you what maybe afterwards we can see how you like being big" he teased.

"Sara big?" She questioned
Then she rocked back and forth a bit cheering

"Sara big Sara big Sara big"


"Well sounds like she approves of that too" he said.


Linda glared at her boss knowing full well they've not tested other functions yet.


"Ok now no matter what stay STILL and be a good girl sweetie" Linda said to her daughter.

"Otay mommy" replied Sara before sticking her finger back into her mouth
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/76...


The scientists then began setting up the device when 1 of the boses secretly had some of the lab technicians make adjustments without telling the other boss or Linda.


"Are you sure about this boss" they asked.

"Yes I'm sure besides we aren't going to make her that much larger so what's the worst that could happen"


The 3 technicians exchanged worried looks.

"You 3 worry too much it's not like we are going to have a giant child on our hands like that Honey I Blew Up The Kid movie and she's just a little girl. You can't make an omelette without cracking a few eggs as they say. Now do as I say"


With that the device was locked onto Sara its target.
Suddenly it began storming outside


"Uhh with all do respect should we be doing these tests during a storm" asked one tech.

"It should be fine besides it's not a bad storm" replied both bosses.

Soon the device powered up and a blue beam struck Sara tickling but not harming her.


At that moment tho there was a power surge a lightning struck the building
The bolt traveled through the buildings wires and to the device there was a bright flash and the beam turned from a beam to a bolt of energy.


At first it didn't seem to harm Sara but nonetheless everyone shouted
"Turn it if turn off quick"

Suddenly it got stronger for a moment and Sara was flung from her seat.
Finally they shut the device off as Linda rushed to get daughter


"Sara Sara are you ok"

The girl sat up seemingly unharmed safe a small bruise
Suddenly Sara sat up and began to cry.


"Damn it Marc and you too Marv I should never have agreed to this shit"

Next...

Never the less there wasn't much choice at the time so Rebecca gave Lindsey a list of dos and donts.



Currently Lindsey was trying to get Anna to stop crying.

Lindsey had been paying so little attention to the instructions she was given and so dense the revelation of a hungry baby would be her last intelligent act for a little while. She searched for a bottle and found 2.

Later

As Anna rises back up to her full height, Sarah watches as she is rising up a bit higher. She looks down to see if Anna is standing on her tip toes, but sees that her feet are flat on the asphalt, and expanding. This girl is growing in front of her very eyes.



The bottom of Anna's dress is rising up to her knees as it is becoming shorter on her. The top becoming very snug on her as seams start to rip a little bit. By the time her hips reach the top of the truck her growth stops.



The sixteen foot toddler looks back at the way she came and heads back towards her daycare.

“Ow it hurts! It hurts! Mommy I’m so hungry! My tummy hurts”


This was something that had slipped Rebecca’s mind after the 1st few hundred feet maybe even before that as this problem didn’t exist when Anna was 6 7 or 9 Feet tall.


“Poor dear what’s wrong with her” asked Luanne.

“I dunno but does she somehow look skinnier to you” asked Luanne’s partner.

Another growl!

“H-help me. F-food please” pleaded Anna.

A “small” tear dropped from her eye. To normal sized people tho it was like a 500 gallon liquid meteorite.
It left a big crater.


“I’m so foolish. Like I said the growth Serum hadn’t yet been tested on humans or animals. Her body has grown and enhanced in nearly every way unfortunately it seems her metabolism hadn’t been able to keep up with the growth. Now it’s catching up in a big bad and dangerous way”


“What do you mean” asked Luanne as another pained moan escaped Anna.


“To put it simply her size has increased her muscles, strength, ability and everything just about except her aging.
Unfortunately it made her stomach acid thousands of times stronger and gave her a stomach of steel.
Her larger size though requires much more nutrients but at her size normal food wouldn’t cut it.
Her mind can’t realize this though as she’s just a child.
She can’t sustain herself.
She’d have some shot if she ate unconventional things such as building, dirt, anything really.”


Rebecca paused then continued.

“Ultimately though even that her body would burn through quickly between her insane stomach acids and her greater need for nutrition and calories.
Lacking that nutrition her body is doing as any human body entering starvation would.
It’s a battle between her stomach, stomach acids and bodies need to burn off something.
Her body is essentially attacking itself.
Were it not for her increased endurance and the increased strength of her body in all regards she’d possibly already have starved to death.
Still it’s a slow and painful losing battle sadly.
Your partner mentioned her looking skinnier.
Any health professional would likely conclude her body’s 1st point of attack is any excess body or baby fat”


-another pause-
This time Anna starts actually crying.

“Oww! Waah! It hurts so much! Waah! Make it stop”

Meteor sized tears pummel the landscape.


“So what’ll happen to the poor dear” asks a concerned Luanne.

“It pains me to say but either 1 of 4 things.
Either A - My daughter will grow and her starvation reaches the point of death despite her size.
B - She realizes she has to eat something a normal person wouldn’t.
C - She somehow finds normal food fitting of her size.
Or D - She actually manages to grow to a theoretical point of actually being self sustaining.”


Suddenly Anna lurched a bit letting out her worst screams yet.
At 1st it’s not apparent why but then they noticed she was growing again.
She increases size a fair bit.
Anna is now 3 miles tall!


“Ahhh please make it stop! Waah! It hurts”

Anna continues to cry her meteor sized tears now even larger.

“Mommy please! It hurrrttts! Waah”

It’s literally a matter of what lasts longer in a high stakes internal battle”

Just then Rebecca notices something bad so does Luanne.
Anna’s tears were drowning or crushing people but there was something else.
Her tears landed on some farm land crops and vegitible gardens.
The foods being grown were started to spring forth and grow greater than what Rebecca had seen in all experiments but 1.

“Oh my god it’s the after effect. That must mean...” she looked around and sure enough there was a tomato field of the red devils large enough to topple buildings but to Anna would have been the size of cherries minus the pits.

After minutes of Anna crying there were tons of patches of various giant edible foods.

Rebecca takes out a tool and tests a nearby pumpkin.
The tests reveal that the moisture in the enlarged plant foods are similar to the serum.


Unbeknownst to Rebecca a co-worker who’d gone mad after the serum incident with Anna had synthesized and tanker load of it and secretly injected or rather pumped it into the tomatoes Rebecca had experimented on.

Rebecca was already forming a hypothesis but now wasn’t the time.


Here was a risky way to prolong Anna’s life and at least temporarily stop her suffering.

It got worse too as a few cows, and pigs, enlarged too but were still smaller than the other foods and quite bite sized to Anna. They too seemed to be embued with serum.

Now the moment of truth for Anna’s fate...

155131322.content:
A large van pulls up into the school parking lot, parking in front of the curb. Once parked, Lindsey, now twenty-two years old, leaves the driver's seat as she makes her way to the side door and opens it up.


         Anna slowly climbs out, her shoulders brushing against the sides of the door. As soon as her large, bare feet hit the pavement, she stands at her full height if twelve feet, stretching as she is glad to be out from the cramped space as her straight, brown hair touches the ground. Wearing what appears to be a makeshift, blue strapless dress that reaches all the way down to her ankles. She looks around at all the stares she is getting, after all, how often do people see such a large child?


          "Have a good day at school today, Anna," Lindsey says.


          "Okay," Ana replies as she starts to head to the school.


          Today is Anna's first day of kindergarten. She is excited to start, yet nervous as she is starting in the middle of the year. She walks around the back of the school towards an area that was recently renovated, accommodating her is the main reason that she had to start in the middle of the year.



A large door is installed so that she may enter comfortably. The top of the door only reaches her shoulders, as she ducks a bit as she opens the door.



         The classroom was renovated to include a twelve foot high ceiling, just tall enough for Anna. As Anna enters the classroom, everyone stops to stare at her. The teacher doesn't even reach her hips, while her fellow classmates are barely past her knees.



          "Now class," Mrs. Pound says. The five foot six brunette woman is in her late forties, wearing a white blouse and black slacks. Her pants almost hiding her flats that she is wearing " This is Anna, and she is starting class with us today, Now I guess you all already know that she is a big girl. Anna would you like to say hello? "



          "Hello," Anna says nervously as she raises her hand.


         The class acts excited, as they think it is neat that Anna is so tall.



          "Now class, settle down," Mrs. Pound says. " I know we all have questions for Anna, but save them for our free time, okay? " As the class heads to their seats, Mrs. Pound points to the back of the class, "Anna, your seat is in the back."



          Anna heads to the back,p where a large desk is waiting for her. sitting on the floor, it is a perfect height for her. As Mrs. Pound starts to talk, a class mate to her left gets her attention.



          "Pssst," the little girl says. She is Japanese, at about four foot eight. Her black hair just past her hips. Wearing a light blue shirt with kanji on the front and a pair of black pants that only reach her ankles, showing off her bare feet. Her white shoes sitting under her desk. "I'm Hinata," she introduces herself, "I think its really neat that you are so tall. Are you still growing?



         Anna nods her head as she curls her toes nervously.



         "That is so neat," Hinata says.
155131322.title: First day of School

1551313223.content:
Anna looks over at Hinata, a bit confused. All her life people have stared at her beause of her height. At first she was often confused for an older girl, but once she started getting close to seven feet, and eventually exceeded it, everyone kept giving her such odd stares. Now she has a fellow classmate who thinks it is neat.

         "Really?" Anna responds in a low voice.

         "Of course," Hinata says with a smile on her face. Her gaze soon turns to Anna's feet. "I also see that you like going barefoot too."

         Anna shakes her head, "No, my feet are just too big for shoes. I used to wear them when I was shorter, but I would outgrow them within a a couple of months."

         "Neat," Hinata says a bit excitedly, curling her short toes. "So how big are..."

         Before Hinata can finish her question, Mrs. Pound interupts. "Hinata, Anna." Both girls look at her as she continues. "Eyes up front, you two can continue your conversation at recess."

         "Yes ma'am," Anna and Hinata say in unison as the class giggles.

         Anna glances over at Hinata. She may be a bit odd, but Anna found her to be a genuine friend.

Adam was a genius.
At the mere age of 12 he was already teaching various sciences and working at a college.


His little sister
Mia - Age 3
Original height 2’5 and small feet
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/94...
could be described in a few words
Cute, timid, shy, kind, gentle but clumsy


Adam wasn’t really into magic being the science type and in fact believed magic was hogwash smoke and mirrors.
Adam however was at the age he was getting an interest in girls.

One day he’d met a new girl in the neighborhood and developed a crush.
He soon found she liked magic.


That brings us to a local magic shop and an apprentice working at it.
While Adam talked to the female shop owner Mia was with the shopkeepers apprentice.

The girl heard the little girls tummy growl.

“Aww are you hungry sweetie”

Mia nodded sheepishly.

“I might have something for you”

The girl pulled out 1 of those bite sized cupcakes.

“Do you like cupcakes”

Mia again nodded as her stomach growls.


“Aww I don’t think I have enough for you. If you can keep a secret I can fix that”

The hungry Mia nodded.

The apprentice took out a book and wand and said something Mia couldn’t understand.
Suddenly the tiny chocolate muffin increased to a full sized one.
The apprentice was unaware the spell hadn’t run its full course.


Mia took the muffin and ate it the incomplete spell transferring to Mia’s body and by extension anything she might be wearing.
( based off of https://commoddity.tumblr.com/post/15803... )
( minus bursting outta clothes )
Adam finished and took Mia home.


Later Mia takes off her shoes and socks having a habit of going barefoot.
Eventually the spell now on Mia begins its effects

Mia had been a small child and somewhat sickly or rather prone to getting sick.
One day Mia had been left with a babysitter that her brother Adam had tutored.
It was a high school student named Rick.


He had been bored babysitting Mia who had a cold.
Rick went looking around the house and soon found a big jug.
It was labeled “Jumbo-Gro”



The picture showed a sickly looking wilting flower in the “before” pannel and
a very tall healthy flower in the after.
Rick wasn’t sure why but a thought entered his mind.
His imagination got the better of him.
He pictured the sickly Mia in the before picture then a red headed mature bombshell in the after picture.


He grabbed the jug and funnel for pouring liquid.
He went to Mia’s room.
She was sleeping soundly.


He took cap off of the jar and poured a good portion down Mia’s throat.


At first nothing happened but moments later she actually grew a bit.
He then watched as in spurts Mia grew older and bigger.

In a couple of minutes there was an adult Mia around 19 looking quite attractive and bursting out of her clothes.
Rick took a few pictures.
He was about to let his hormones do the talking when her body shudders.


To his disappointment she began regressing back to her normal self.
He leaves the room in disappointment.
Mia wakes up and spots the jug.


She gets a different idea than Rick had and drinks some of it.



Sometime later.....

15534.content:
Ok so I had this kinda crazy
semi new idea for

Alice in wonderland meets aliens meets
Sci-Fi meets magic which I might slip into
other interactives of mine too.



It’s modern-ish day.
All is normal for a girl who need not be
named or dressed like Alice

That is until she’s abducted and dragged into
an unexpected rabbits hole!

She is brought to a planet nearly identical
To Earth.
She never sees her captives but they speak to
her.


“Young girl you have been transported from
your home world to what we’ve dubbed
Earth-Athalon a replica of your earth nearly
identical except a few major and minor things!


You have been chosen for
“Project Choice Wonderland”
A long term experiment by several alien
races and tribunals joined together!

On this Earth you’ll find everything you need
to survive either in the wilds or civilization
however you are the ONLY Earthling!

Most things are as they are on your
Earth however this Earth is 20x larger
than your Earth and while there’s water
you’ll find no sea or oceans.

There are rivers, lakes, hot springs and
cold springs, and ponds.
You’ll also notice a lack of certain animal
species.

As part of this project you’ll notice that you
age at 1/3000th your normal rate even though
time passes as on your Earth.

Furthermore it is based in part on some of
what your culture calls wonderland media.

While some water is normal please note
the signs that will be posted near certain
plants or water sources,

There are several hot springs, cold springs,
lakes, and even plants with signs near them
labeled 1 of 3 things
“Grow”
“Shrink”
“Normalizer”

And yes as they suggest eating or drinking
them will produce the effect listed.
You can at your leisure shrink or grow in
size however as you are in captivity here
you’ll find that even if you tried outgrowing
planets there’s a limit and an impenetrable
barrier!


If you try to escape or outgrow it the
barrier WILL ZAP and shrink you in a
painful process unlike that of the
magic water or plants.

Also please note that aside from the barrier
if you’re enlarged to more than
10x your normal size or shrunken to any smaller
than doll sized or roughy 10 inches you’ll
gain invulnerability to everything except the
barrier.


Also please note that in addition to housing
for your normal size you’ll find scaled up
housing for you while giant sized should you
want or need it however you will not
find real housing for you in your shrunken
state unless of course you locate a dollhouse.


You’ll also find that nothing on this faux
Earth is poisonous!
We wish you luck as we observe you
on this unique experiment!
Also you’ll find a few things more high
tech than you might be accustomed to
such as Robots, Androids, several smart
devices and also Q & A booths with signs
should you need to talk to us again!


With that the experiment and your
captivity monitoring has begun”


It was then that they noticed a spare human!

“We see that we somehow brought your
older sibling with you! It matters not
but take heed for your older sibling
WILL NOT be able to change size or gain
immunity to harm. Also the barrier would
likely kill your elder sibling if they touch it!”

155341.title: Project Choice Wonderland- character pairs

info.brief_description: Everything is normal for the guys in here until a problem arises quite literally.
info.description:
Based off of and inspired by several stories as well as some discussion with friends on Discord.


The main character ( a male of your choice ) has at least 1 ( possibly more ) little sister and all is well until something happens and now your little sister (s) is soon to be not so little anymore.


Chaos and more might ensue.

Little Sister (s) may be any age 13 and under
( although age progression is allowed the preferred changes are
Characters shrinking or the sister growing in size possibly into a giantess and beyond. Use your imagination )

Rules

1 > NO MALE Giants
2 > Keep the story going
3 > Reasonable grammar
4 > Don't go ridiculously overboard on breast sizes
5 > NO Scat, poop , or the like

6 > Don't get too descriptive with sex/incest skip or gloss over it if possible assuming you feel it necessary

7 > Giantesses can't die

8 > I reserve the right to edit modify or delete chapters as I or moderators see fit.

9 > I reserve the right to edit add or delete the story rules with that have fun with the sister(s)

New rule as of 1/21/18

10 > No Kaiju or Godzilla Type freak outs unless it actually fits their personality or description please. And if they do go Godzilla they won’t suddenly have fire breath, laser eyes or whatever
